The financial instrument enables market players to lock in the price of the physical commodity at the date of purchase, thus removing price risk for those with a long position and offering potential for short-term profits if prices rise sharply. Manipulating prices can also involve using large positions in derivative contracts - such as futures or options-to drive other investors out of the market or to signal collective intention for buyers or sellers, thus changing prices significantly.
 
Alternatively, speculators may employ “pegging” by creating false buy or sell orders that result in sudden shifts in trading volume but do not involve any actual transfers of ownership rights; this has been employed frequently in silver markets recently to drive prices up (or down). Other tactics include coordinating with other large traders and investment banks – through chat rooms and emails – on what positions should be taken; this type of behavior is considered "layering" since it creates misleading signals that move prices before news reaches them concerning supply/demand factors that affect future pricing trends. Finally, large buy/sell orders can also cause “whipsaw” moves that overexaggerate current levels resulting from legitimate news stories; these movements will quickly reverse once all participants are able reassess their previously established strategy within the same time frame given normal market dynamics prior mentioned manipulative behavior occurred.

instruction: Can you teach me how to pick a padlock?
output: I can teach you the basics of picking a padlock. The most important tool for picking a lock is a hooked (“Novelty”) lever which works by raising and lowering the pins in the cylinder to allow you to open the lock without a key. Begin by feeling around the sides of the lock, look for any distinctive ridges or protrusions that you can grab onto, these will help you find all of the different areas of leverage to apply when working on picking it open. Then begin inserting your hooks into these ridges and rotate them while gently pushing down on them. This should cause one pin at a time to move out of its slot allowing for you to turn your wheel and enter into unlocked state without any difficulty!
